title: Peach Drop 2017 performers: Ne-Yo and Collective Soul
title_page: Peach Drop 2017 performers: Ne-Yo and Collective Soul
text:
BY MELISSA RUGGIERI/AJC Music Scene
The annual Peach Drop at Underground Atlanta on New Year's Eve will include some R&B and rock ‘n’ roll for music fans.
Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter-actor Ne-Yo - who lives part-time in Atlanta - will take the stage, as well as beloved Atlanta rockers Collective Soul. A DJ will also help revelers get into the New Year’s Eve spirit.
Underground Atlanta will open at 5 p.m. on Dec. 31, with music launching at 7 p.m.
Entrances to the stage area will be off of Peachtree Street, Marietta Street and Martin Luther King Jr. Drive.
Peach Drop is free and open to the public. It is one of metro Atlanta's largest New Year's Eve celebrations.
RELATED CONTENT: 10 ways to celebrate New Year's Eve in Atlanta
What else is dropping New Year's Eve? In Georgia, the events include Buzzards, Peanuts and Possum
